Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: Consider Identity.Serialize may return a different byte representation of marshalled identity
Issue.description: We would need to find a workaround there for uses of identity.Serialize that are used for identity comparison check. One such occurrence is the gossip getPKIidFromCertificate (another jira item) and another one is the satisfiesPolicy function inside msp/mspimpl.go. This work-item refers to the latter.
